ABOUT ME

Hello, my name is Sonali Kishan. I am currently pursuing B-Tech Computer Engineering branch from IIIT(International Institute Of Information Technology) Bhubaneswar. I completed my 10th and 12th from Saint Arnold's School(ICSE) and Loyola School(ISC) respectively. I learnt to code since I was in school. When I was in class 9th, I was introduced to JAVA language as part of my academic curriculum. Now, I love investing my time in learning Web-Development and I create amazing websites everyday for fun.
